last_episode_to_air.name: Save the Farm
last_episode_to_air.overview: Weasel McGreed is planning to buy Farmer Ben's farm to make it his new headquarters, but he refuses to sell.

name: The Berenstain Bears
overview: An animated television series based on Stan and Jan Berenstain's Berenstain Bears children's book series.

episodes.name: The Messy Room
episodes.overview: Mama tries to get the cubs to give their messy room a complete cleanup within a 15-minute time limit. Failing to do so, she tries to throw away their stuff, but Papa stops them and he has a better idea.

episodes.name: The Terrible Termite
episodes.overview: Raffish Ralph meets the Terrible Termite (who can eat wood in seconds) and decides to use him to threaten people who do not buy his "termite insurance". However, when the Termite realizes he is being used he refuses to serve Ralph anymore, and Brother and Sister free the termite into threatening Ralph's houseboat unless he retires from the insurance business.

episodes.name: Go Fly A Kite
episodes.overview: Papa Bear makes such a big kite for the kite flying contest that it carries him away and into a hang-gliding contest.

episodes.name: The Trojan Pumpkin
episodes.overview: Papa gets a magic pumpkin seed that grows into a mutant pumpkin. But Brother and Sister discover it's a scheme by Weasel McGreed to take over Bear Country.

episodes.name: The Spooky Old Mansion
episodes.overview: The whole bear family is terrified of a spooky mansion down the road. Mama explains that when she was a cub it was owned by a nice lady who was a friendly neighbor, but when she moved away no one else bought it and it fell into disrepair. Mama thinks about buying it to restore it to its former glory, but she needs Papa and the cubs to overcome their fears and superstitions.

episodes.name: The Fly Away Pizza
episodes.overview: Papa enters a pizza-twirling competition and Weasel McGreed and Raffish Ralph decide to take advantage of this in order to take over Bear Country.

episodes.name: The Giant Bat Cave
episodes.overview: Raffish Ralph is planning to wreck Giant Bat Cave to build an amusement park, but the cubs, with the help of a smart bat, are able to scare him away with the usage of a giant, fake bat.

episodes.name: The Wild Wild Honey
episodes.overview: Papa tries to steal some of Queen Nectar's wild wild honey.

episodes.name: The Neighborly Skunk
episodes.overview: A skunk moves in next door to the Bear family.

episodes.name: The Missing Pumpkin
episodes.overview: Farmer Ben's prize pumpkin goes missing, so the bear detective cubs decide to search for it.

episodes.name: Too Much Birthday
episodes.overview: Sister's sixth birthday is coming up. The preparations for the party are bigger than Mama expected, including ponies and a merry-go-round Papa hired. The party is pretty distressing for Sister, but by the end of the party, she sees the advantage of growing up.

episodes.name: To the Rescue
episodes.overview: The Bear Scouts Brother, Sister, and Cousin Freddy try to earn their merit badges. Papa tries to help, but his reckless and clumsy antics make him the one in need of rescuing. Still, the scouts earn their badges eventually.

episodes.name: The Soccer Star
episodes.overview: Brother Bear tries out for the soccer team.

episodes.name: Shoot the Rapids
episodes.overview: The Bear Scouts try to earn their whitewater merit badges.

episodes.name: Knight to Remember
episodes.overview: The cubs find a cursed suit of armor.

episodes.name: The Super Duper Bowl
episodes.overview: Raffish Ralph has a football scheme that involves holding a Super Duper Bowl.

episodes.name: The Not So Buried Treasure
episodes.overview: The bears find a treasure map.

episodes.name: The Condemned Backscratcher
episodes.overview: Raffish Ralph convinces the mayor to build a superhighway which threatens a Bear Country landmark.

episodes.name: Kong for a Day
episodes.overview: Bigpaw is captured by Raffish Ralph and Weasel McGreed and exhibited.

episodes.name: No Girls Allowed
episodes.overview: Sister Bear can run faster, climb higher, and hit a ball farther than the boys, and she gloats over it. So Brother Bear and his friends build a clubhouse for boys only, and when Sister discovers this, she plans a terrible revenge on the boys.

episodes.name: The Missing Dinosaur Bone
episodes.overview: McGreedy Weasel and Raffish Ralph hypnotize Bigpaw Bear into attacking Bear Town. But, Brother and Sister break the spell in a flash. They know you can't make someone do something they really don't want to do!

episodes.name: The Spookiest Pumpkin
episodes.overview: Papa is ambitious to win a pumpkin carving contest and Brother and Sister are also joining in. Papa is extremely secretive with his own pumpkin and guards it closely. Papa then has nightmares and he chooses to miss out on the contest.

episodes.name: The Dancing Bees
episodes.overview: Papa buys from Raffish Ralph "The Secret of the Dancing Bees" book and dons on a bee costume in hopes of extracting Queen Nectar's honey. His plan works and humours the bees but when Ralph tries it, the bees are not impressed.

episodes.name: Learn About Strangers
episodes.overview: After Papa Bear explains about the rules with strangers, Brother decides to only talk to strangers with radio-controlled airplanes and Sister is suddenly scared of everything, viewing all strangers as ominous. But soon, Moma brins some reassuring common sense to the problem, and resolve the children's disputes.

episodes.name: The Disappearing Honey
episodes.overview: Papa Bear's favorite blackberry honey disappears, and he starts accusing everyone in town, so the Bear Detectives set out to find the culprit. He soon discovers he was the one who ate all of the honey in his sleep.

episodes.name: In the Dark
episodes.overview: After a scary bedtime story, Sister Bear is too frightened of the dark to shut her eyes. But her parents give her some sound psychological advice and a night-light, that will help Sister conquer her fears.

episodes.name: Ring the Bell
episodes.overview: At the Bear Country Fair, Too Tall Grizzly begins to taunt Brother Bear, resulting in a fight and is ended in a challenge of strength between Pa Bear and the formidable Two-Ton Grizzly.

episodes.name: Forget Their Manners
episodes.overview: Mama Bear decides to take her ill-mannered family in hand and offers them lessons to become polite, but she realizes that she received better luck from children than Papa. Unsuccessful in her method, she devises a Politeness Plan - a chart listing a chore as a penalty for each act of rudeness. The cubs foil the plan by being super polite and actually enjoy it.

episodes.name: The Wicked Weasel Spell
episodes.overview: McGreedy Weasel and Raffish Ralph hypnotize Bigpaw Bear into attacking Bear Town. But, Brother and Sister break the spell in a flash. They know you can't make someone do something they really don't want to do!

episodes.name: The Truth
episodes.overview: On the loose, Brother and Sister defy Mama Bear's rule of only playing ball outside, by shattering Mama Bear's favorite lamp. Felling guilty, the two lie about it, but soon, with much coaxing and fact checking by Mama and Papa Bear, the cubs learn the importance of telling the truth.

episodes.name: Save the Bees
episodes.overview: Raffish Ralph is chosen by Arch Weasel to create an ultimate weapon to take down Bear Country. They unleash a field of menacing honey bell flowers that threaten Bear Country's supply of honey, by engulfing all bees.

episodes.name: Get in a Fight
episodes.overview: Brother and Sister get involved in a fight, that lasts all day long, and Mama Bear intervenes, revealing that everyone argues once in a while, even with loved ones.

episodes.name: The Bigpaw Problem
episodes.overview: When Big Paw is arrested for being too big and clumsy, Big Paw receives the chance to save Bear Country from the effects of an earthquake, and he is declared a national treasure.

episodes.name: Get Stage Fright
episodes.overview: Sister Bear is feared that she will forget her lines when she is chosen to lead a school play. Despite Brother's teasing, she follows Mama's advice and practises until she's perfect. On the night of the performance, it's Brother who ends up with stage fright and who is rescued by his sympathetic sister.

episodes.name: Go Bonkers Over Honkers
episodes.overview: The Berenstain Bears Go Bonkers Over Honkers.

episodes.name: The Great Honey Pipeline
episodes.overview: After some convincing from Brother and Sister, Papa promises not to go after Wild Wild Honey anymore. But when Queen Nectar's honey supply goes missing, the Bear Detectives find Papa broke his word, so they recover the honey and give Papa a lesson he'll never forget.

episodes.name: The Great Grizzly Comet
episodes.overview: The Great Grizzly Comet is passing. Some "little green bears" arrive with a warning that the comet is on a collision course with Bear Country. Papa tells Farmer Ben, who both spread the alarm to evacuate Bear Country.

episodes.name: The Sure-Fire Bait
episodes.overview: Papa is determined to catch Old Jake the catfish.

episodes.name: The Cat's Meow
episodes.overview: Brother and Sister Bear are given the duty to look after Mrs. Honeybear's cat, Puff, while she's away on a trip with her family. Puff's unique meow leads the Berenstain Bears on quest to figure out why cat meow.

episodes.name: The Trouble With Friends
episodes.overview: A new Bear family arrives in a nearby treehouse, and Sister Bear finally finds a new friend who is around her age. Unfortunately, her new friend's tendency toward bossiness and bragging soon dampens their relationship.

episodes.name: The Coughing Catfish
episodes.overview: Jake the giant Catfish, among other animals are affected by garbage dumping in the lake. Brother and Sister get help from Professor Actual Factual to scan the extensive garbage pollution. Their solution is to use a sunken pirate ship as an attraction to fund cleanup projects.

episodes.name: The Substitute Teacher
episodes.overview: Brother, Cousin Freddy, and Too-Tall and his gang set up practical jokes for a substitute teacher, but they learn to like her when they realize what she is like.

episodes.name: The Mansion Mystery
episodes.overview: The Bear Detectives are on a mission once again, as they are given the news that all of the antique treasures in the Grizzly Mansion have been stolen and replaved with counterfeits.

episodes.name: Bust A Ghost
episodes.overview: The Bear Scouts have ghost troubles.

episodes.name: The Ice Monster
episodes.overview: The ice carnival is starting soon. Suddenly Raffish Ralph spots an ice monster. The ice monster is revealed to be a sleepwalking Bigpaw, who decides to skip his hibernation and join in the fun.

episodes.name: The Crystal Ball Caper
episodes.overview: Gran's future-predicting crystal ball goes missing.

episodes.name: The Raid on Fort Grizzly
episodes.overview: Raffish Ralph and Weasel McGreed plan to steal from the Fort Grizzly treasury.

episodes.name: The Forbidden Cave
episodes.overview: When Sister Bear, Brother Bear, and Cousin Fred earn their Spelunker First Class merit badges the hard way, they use their Bear Scout smarts to lead Papa Bear and Professor Actual Factual safely out of the Forbidden Cave.

episodes.name: The Hot Air Election
episodes.overview: Raffish Ralph convinces Papa to run for public office, sparking a fiery election.

episodes.name: Life With Papa
episodes.overview: Papa Bear learns that taking care of everything at home is not as easy as it may seem, when Mama Bear is needed to help Cousin Min with her new baby. Papa is unable to complete each of the tasks left behind by Mama Bear.

episodes.name: Save the Farm
episodes.overview: Weasel McGreed is planning to buy Farmer Ben's farm to make it his new headquarters, but he refuses to sell.
